Uses of Class
cz.opendata.tenderstats.ComponentConfiguration

    • Uses of ComponentConfiguration in cz.opendata.tenderstats

      Fields in cz.opendata.tenderstats declared as ComponentConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ComponentConfiguration AbstractComponent.config
      Holds component configuration needed for network communication with databases and other values.
      Needs to be initialized first with value returned by AbstractComponent.getConfiguration() before first use.
      If the AbstractComponent.init() method is called, it happens automatically.
      Methods in cz.opendata.tenderstats that return ComponentConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ComponentConfiguration AbstractComponent.getConfiguration()
      Gets component configuration which contains values from deployment descriptor (web.xml) and relational database.
